title: Short-Term Course for Online Mathematics Educational Material Development and Teacher Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education methodologies and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment focusing on integrating OER (Open Educational Resources) and VLE (Virtual Learning Environment) tools for elementary mathematics curriculum alignment.

learning_goals: Participating teachers can produce and utilize at least three types of OER for mathematics education within one week.
Achieve an 85% or higher peer review completion rate with fellow teachers by applying a feedback-based evaluation system.
Assess the ability to design mathematics educational materials by integrating VLE tools (Quiz Maker, LMS) with external OER.
Acquire the method of visually representing learning outcomes using a digital badge system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
